name: The Capsule Hotel
description:
The Capsule Hotel Sydney is one of the remaining grand heritage hotels in Australia.

The Capsule Hotel offers futuristic-style accommodation in the heart of the Sydney CBD (Central Business District) and above The Century Bar, which has a range of tap beers and a wide selection of cocktails darts and other entertainment.

The Capsule Hotel is situated on the corner of George Street and Liverpool Street and within a 2-minute walk from Town Hall Railway Station, offering access to all of Sydney’s top attractions. including Hyde Park, Darling Harbour, World Square ICC Sydney Theatre and Pitt Street Mall. Darling Harbour and Chinatown are both within a 5-minute walk. Sydney Airport is 20 minutes away by train or car.

Free WiFi is provided throughout the property and rooms. Featuring front or side entry, each unique capsule comes with a locker (guests need to bring their own padlock or can purchase at reception), USB plugs and lights with power point. All rooms are air-conditioned and bed linen is provided. Our capsule includes towels. Laundry facilities are available for an additional charge.

Sydney CBD is a great choice for travellers interested in shopping, food and restaurants.

Solo travellers particularly like our location — they rated it 9.1 for a one-person stay.

This property is also rated for the best value in Sydney! Guests are getting more for their money when compared to other properties in this city.

On-day booking can only be made before 10:30pm . Booking received after 10:30pm is for future check-in dater only.

Xmas and NYE Policies - Any bookings between 24 Dec - 2 Jan & 24 Dec - 2 Jan are all Non - Refundable. No cancellations or refunds are permitted on bookings during the New Year’s Eve period.

houseRules.notes:
The Capsule Hotel - Important Information Regarding Late Check-in

Dear Guest,

Greetings from The Capsule Hotel, and thank you for your reservation.

For check-in, please ensure you present the same credit card used for the online payment and a valid photo ID for verification. Our policy requires the credit card holder's name to match the booking name.

Our standard check-in time is after 2 PM, and our reception is open daily from 10 AM to 9 PM. If you anticipate arriving after 9 PM, please inform us in advance.

For late arrivals, check-in can be arranged either through our safe box (self check-in procedure) or at the bar. Please note that check-in at the bar is not possible after 12 AM.

Same-day bookings can only be made before 8:30 PM.

*Christmas and New Year's Eve Policy*
Please be aware that all bookings made between December 24th and January 2nd are non-refundable. No cancellations or refunds are permitted for bookings during this period.

We look forward to welcoming you to The Capsule Hotel.
